Articles.Content:
so with .22 i discovered in my steam file the new launcher but when i open it it has "update" and "Play" greyed out and i cant click on them

Is this a bug or intentional?

can anyone shed some light on me about this?

thanks
The launcher is buggy on steam versions, it'll take a while before they roll out an update to make the launcher usable, and to make steam automatically use it.
I can use the launcher, but I copied the game out of my Steam folder - maybe..?
